and.name: VariabilityBash
and.description: This feature model represents a product line for a command line tool.

or.name: Authentication
or.description: Before the VariabilityBash can be used the user needs to authenticate itself.

feature.name: Username
feature.description: The user needs to provide an username.

feature.name: Password
feature.description: The user needs to provide a password to authenticate itself.

and.name: Input
and.description: Represents the interface for the user to input textual information into the VariabilityBash.

and.name: CommandParser
and.description: Is used to identify a command from the input given into the VariabilityBash.

feature.name: cd
feature.description: Is a command. Allows the user to change the current working directory.

feature.name: ls
feature.description: Is a command. List every file and directory of the current working directory.

feature.name: mkdir
feature.description: Is a command. Creates a new directory.

feature.name: mkfile
feature.description: Is a command. Creates a new file.

and.name: help
and.description: Is a coomand. Lists all available commands.

feature.name: Name
feature.description: When 'help' is used at least the name for every command shloud be displayed. Therefore, name is mandatory.

feature.name: Description
feature.description: Provide sthe ability to create descriptions for command and to show them when excecuting 'help'

feature.name: UsageExample
feature.description: Allows a command to provide a description how to use the particular command.

feature.name: rm
feature.description: Is a command. Can remove directories and files.

feature.name: cat
feature.description: Is a command. Shows the data of an given file.

and.name: Output
and.description: Manages the textual output of the VariabilityBash

alt.name: TextColor
alt.description: A text color is needed. Therefore, the feature is mandatory.

feature.name: BackgroundBlack
feature.description: Sets the background color to black.

feature.name: BackgroundWhite
feature.description: Sets the background color to white.

feature.name: Logger
feature.description: Logs every command excecuted with the VariabilityBash.

rule.description: If we provide the ability to create files or directories we also provide a way to remove them. It also applies the other way around.
